data.message:
Hello, here the agenda of Sprint #36 Demo :
* Static source IP for serverless features
* Reminder about firewall rules management
* Sending Informations about LZ lifecycle in PubSub
* REX on utilization of public API (Terraform Cloud, Google...)

See you on Monday the 2nd at 10H30

Hey guys, open question.

Do you know if we have the Kepler data (the ADEO tool where we manage the transport costs of our customer orders) published in our beloved data platform? I've been looking for dataFinder but I can't find anything.

Thanks for your collaboration

data.message:
Good afternoon,
This week, during the night between Thursday and Friday at 01:00 am french hour, we will activate a new route between GCP europe-west4 (Netherlands Eemshaven) and Adeo's Netcenter in Frankfurt.
Purpose of this change is to decrease costs.(Stop flows between Adeo to GCP europe-west4 (Netherlands Eemshaven) via GCP europe-west3 (Frankfurt))
No perturbations are expected for this change.
CHG0037758

GCP Support during official Black Friday.

As google support team will be very busy during Black Friday, our Tam (Technical Account Manager) ask us if we have some apps, in production on GCP, that will suppose to have peak of use during the Black Friday (27 of november)

If it's the case for your app, please fill the follow sheet :

[https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pQE-_6keDvEjT5daOH4adWAZiM-K89IfSGavfTgEOMo/edit#gid=0](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pQE-_6keDvEjT5daOH4adWAZiM-K89IfSGavfTgEOMo/edit#gid=0)

data.message:
Next Demo : Sprint #33

Friday the 28 of August 10H00

https://meet.google.com/nkb-eowe-mpc?hs=122&authuser=0

Agenda :
* All feature are available on LZ v2 ! (LZ v1 deprecated)
* Billing info on Spootnik
* Conformity check

Bonjour à tous, voici les documents et la présentation AppSheet.

En quelques mots, AppSheet permet de construire et de déployer des apps (mobile+web) sans écrire une ligne de code.

1. L'app est prête beaucoup plus **rapidement** qu'un développement classique

2. Son créateur (qui n'est pas forcément technique) est **autonome** pour la faire évoluer avant et après la mise en ligne

3. Toutes les apps sont **standardisées** et supervisées par une équipe centrale qui garantie la **sécurité** et une **gouvernance** maîtrisée

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jmduN1j6ONkQMxntTd6EVml9yildpqss/view?usp=sharing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1HuVx_TBJ4zbCyDYNP4gL9p8-_PrcQIzi/view?usp=sharing

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ZUReqMN98thbYha6WmdkPLcGLaOb_7V-/view?usp=sharing

Ce produit ne fait pas parti de GCP et Adeo n'a pas encore contractualisé. Les équipes Workplace SIMON CANIZAREZ testent en ce moment ce produit.
